Pomodoro Timer combined with to-do list to help you stay focused and boost productivity.

# Vue 3 PWA + Vuetify
## **PomodoTask - Focus & Productivity App**

PomodoTask is a powerful **Pomodoro Timer** combined with a **To-Do List**, designed to help you **stay focused and boost productivity**. Built with **Vue.js Vite PWA** and **Vuetify**, it offers a seamless and responsive experience across all devices. Whether you're studying, working, or managing tasks, PomodoTask keeps you organized and efficientâ€”**even offline**.

âœ… **Pomodoro Timer** â€“ Stay productive with a built-in Pomodoro technique timer (customizable session & break durations).

ðŸ”„ **Task-Based Timer** â€“ Link tasks to your Pomodoro sessions to track progress and maintain focus.

ðŸ“± **PWA (Progressive Web App) - Works Offline!** â€“ Install and use the app like a native mobile application, even without an internet connection.

ðŸ—‚ **Smart Local Storage (No Backend Needed!)**

- **LocalStorage** â€“ Stores user settings (theme, Pomodoro duration) for instant access.
- **IndexedDB** â€“ Saves tasks, Pomodoro history, and productivity data securely.
- **PWA Cache** â€“ Ensures the app loads instantly, even when offline.

ðŸŽ¨ **Beautiful UI with Vuetify** â€“ Enjoy a modern, sleek, and responsive design for a smooth user experience.

ðŸŒ™ **Dark Mode Support** â€“ Switch between light and dark themes for comfortable usage.

ðŸ“Š **Productivity Insights** â€“ View session history, completed tasks, and focus statistics to track your progress.

ðŸš€ **Fast & Lightweight** â€“ Optimized with Vue.js for blazing-fast performance.

ðŸ“¤ **Sync & Save Tasks (Future Update)** â€“ Option to export and back up tasks for easy recovery.

During my tenure at Imani Prima, I contributed to the development and maintenance of several web applications using modern frameworks and technologies. My responsibilities included designing user interfaces, implementing responsive layouts, and integrating RESTful APIs to enhance application functionality. I collaborated closely with cross-functional teams to deliver scalable solutions that met client requirements. Additionally, I optimized database queries and improved application performance through code refactoring and best practices. My experience with Vue.js, Nuxt.js, Angular, Express, and PostgreSQL enabled me to tackle complex challenges and deliver robust products. This role strengthened my problem-solving skills and deepened my understanding of full-stack development.

During my tenure at Imani Prima, I contributed to the development and maintenance of several web applications using modern frameworks and technologies My responsibilities included designing user interfaces, implementing responsive layouts, and integrating RESTful APIs to enhance application functionality. I collaborated closely with cross-functional teams to deliver scalable solutions that met client requirements. Additionally, I optimized database queries and improved application performance through code refactoring and best practices. My experience with Vue.js, Nuxt.js, Angular, Express, and PostgreSQL enabled me to tackle complex challenges and deliver robust products. This role strengthened my problem-solving skills and deepened my understanding of full-stack development.

During my internship at Nusantara Techno, I was entrusted with the responsibility of developing and maintaining web applications using Laravel as the primary backend framework. My role involved collaborating closely with the development team to design, implement, and optimize features that enhanced user experience and system performance. I contributed to both frontend and backend tasks, utilizing Bootstrap for responsive UI design and MySQL for efficient data management. One of my key projects was building a custom dashboard for internal use, which streamlined data visualization and reporting for the company. I worked on integrating third-party APIs, ensuring seamless data flow between services, and troubleshooting issues that arose during development. My daily activities included writing clean, maintainable code, participating in code reviews, and adhering to best practices in software engineering. I also assisted in refactoring legacy code to improve scalability and maintainability, which involved updating outdated libraries and restructuring database schemas. This experience deepened my understanding of MVC architecture and RESTful API design. Additionally, I collaborated with UI/UX designers to translate wireframes into functional interfaces, ensuring cross-browser compatibility and mobile responsiveness. Throughout the internship, I gained valuable insights into agile development methodologies, participating in sprint planning and daily stand-ups. I learned to manage tasks using project management tools and communicated effectively with team members to resolve technical challenges. My exposure to real-world development environments enhanced my problem-solving skills and adaptability. Overall, my time at Nusantara Techno provided me with hands-on experience in full-stack web development, strengthened my technical foundation, and prepared me for future roles in the software industry.

i was graduated from a boarding school that there's nothing in it. i'm not sure what i'm going to do with my life since i was 8th grade. after thinking a lot, i decided to try Landscape Architecture Major. but, unfortunately, i failed.

thankfully i was set my deciding some plan if i was failed in 'A' plan.
